meanings: appraisal, assessment, (가치·수준 등을 평함)<명>evaluation, estimation, <동>evaluate, estimate, assess, appraise
relative evaluation, grade on a curve

examples.korean: He believes his house has been undervalued. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자기 집이 시세보다 싸게 평가되었다고 믿는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Work in the home is often ignored and devalued. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 가정 내의 노동은 흔히 무시되고 평가 절하된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Surveyors carried out a valuation of the property. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 조세 사정관들이 그 부동산에 대한 평가를 실시했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
